description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

One of your eyes has developed into a conduit for the Akashic Record, the transitory plane of all knowledge. You Recall Knowledge using @Check[type:occultism|traits:action:recall-knowledge] instead of any other skill as though Occultism were applicable to perform Recall Knowledge for that creature.

Critical Success You recall accurately and gain two pieces of additional information or context.

Success You recall accurately and gain a piece of additional information or context and a piece of erroneous knowledge, but don't have any way to differentiate which is which.

Failure You gain a piece of additional information or context and a piece of erroneous information.

Critical Failure You gain two pieces of erroneous information.
